common.description: Integrated solutions in Glovia® ERP, custom development, and high-performance infrastructure to drive your business forward.
common.motto: We turn technological challenges into competitive advantages.

services.upgrades_description: Our Installation and Upgrade service ensures your system stays current. With this service, your business can maintain access to the latest software version, complete with all available features and security updates.
services.glovia_description: Glovia® ERP is a comprehensive, integrated enterprise management system that provides solutions across all areas of your business. With this system, you can optimize processes, reduce costs, and increase team productivity.
services.integration_description: Our ERP Integration service enables you to connect different company systems to improve internal efficiency and communication. This integration allows you to automate processes, reduce errors and redundant work, and enhance decision-making.
services.webdesign_description: Create a modern, responsive website for your business with our web design service. This service helps improve user experience, increase brand visibility, and generate more leads and sales for your business.
services.infrastructure_description: Have a high-performance infrastructure to support your business growth. Our Infrastructure service ensures your company has the necessary resources to handle increased demand and business expansion.
services.support_description: Count on specialized technical support to resolve issues and maintain system stability. Our Technical Support service ensures your company has the necessary support to keep your system running efficiently and securely.

about_us.header_description: At CSN Technology, we combine technical expertise with strategic vision to drive digital transformation for businesses. With over a decade of experience, we deliver customized ERP solutions that optimize operations and generate tangible results.
about_us.excellence_description: Streamlined processes through integrated ERP solutions
about_us.partnership_description: Long-term relationships built on measurable results
about_us.innovation_description: Technology roadmap aligned with global trends
about_us.cta_description: Our team is here to tackle your challenges and deliver tailored tech solutions.
about_us.mission_text: At CSN Consulting in Technology, our mission is to provide integrated technological solutions that drive the digital transformation of our clients, adding value and contributing to the sustainable growth of their businesses.
about_us.vision_text: To be the most trusted and innovative technology consulting firm in the industry, recognized for our ability to anticipate trends and create solutions that empower our clients to stand out in an ever-evolving market.
about_us.values_text: We foster creativity and the pursuit of new technologies and approaches to solve problems effectively.
about_us.commitment_text: We are dedicated to understanding and meeting the unique needs of each client, prioritizing their satisfaction and success.
about_us.ethics_text: We act with integrity, building relationships based on trust and honesty.
about_us.collaboration_text: We value teamwork, believing that effective partnerships lead to more robust solutions and superior results.
about_us.excellence_text: We strive for excellence in everything we do, from delivering our services to building relationships with our clients and collaborators.

not_found.header_description_1: We are working to bring you an even better experience.
not_found.header_description_2: Soon, this page will be available with all the necessary information.
not_found.return_title: In the meantime, you can return to the homepage.
not_found.return_cta: Click here to go back to the homepage.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.name: First Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.agreement: I agree with the privacy policy.

descriptions.gerenciamento_de_produtos: Complete control of product lifecycle, from registration to inventory tracking and technical specifications
descriptions.gerenciamento_de_clientes: Centralized customer data, purchase history and interactions for personalized relationships
descriptions.gerenciamento_de_fornecedores: Strategic management of business partners with performance evaluation and purchase process control
descriptions.business_intelligence: Real-time data analysis with interactive dashboards and reports for strategic decision making
descriptions.cadeia_de_suprimentos: Integrated logistics optimization with demand management, distribution planning and inventory control
descriptions.manufatura: Production process control with resource management, production orders and quality assurance
descriptions.gerenciamento_de_servicos: Organization of contracts, SLAs and technical support for post-sales service excellence
descriptions.gerenciamento_de_projetos: Project planning and monitoring with resource allocation, schedules and performance indicators
descriptions.financeiro: Integrated management of accounts, cash flow, collections and compliance with fiscal accounting standards

glovia.why-use_description: Our Glovia ERP support team provides customized solutions that maximize the system's potential. We ensure real-time responses for critical decisions, optimized operational efficiency, and support for multiple languages for global operations.
glovia.benefits_description: Our specialized Glovia ERP support delivers significant benefits to businesses, including streamlined processes, improved data accuracy, and enhanced decision-making capabilities. With our support, businesses experience reduced operational costs, increased productivity, and more efficient operations.
glovia.how-it-works_description: Our approach to operational excellence involves providing specialized technical support for Glovia ERP, integrating seamlessly into your existing workflows. We offer training, ongoing support, and system optimization to ensure your operations run smoothly and efficiently.
glovia.testimonials_description: Hear from industry leaders who have enhanced their businesses with our Glovia ERP support. Their success stories highlight tangible benefits, including greater efficiency, cost reduction, and a competitive edge in their respective markets.

upgrades.why-use_description: We offer upgrade services to ensure your systems are always up-to-date with the latest features and security patches. This maximizes performance and stability in your technological environment.
upgrades.benefits_description: Our upgrade services bring benefits such as enhanced security, compatibility with new technologies, improved system performance, and reduced risk of failures. Your business stays one step ahead.
upgrades.how-it-works_description: Our upgrade process is carefully planned and executed to minimize disruptions. We conduct pre-analysis, complete backups, and rigorous testing to ensure a smooth and secure transition.
upgrades.testimonials_description: Clients who have upgraded with us report greater reliability and performance in their systems. Their experiences demonstrate the effectiveness and professionalism of our work.

webdesign.why-use_description: We create website designs that combine aesthetics and functionality, delivering an exceptional user experience and strengthening your brand's digital presence.
webdesign.benefits_description: Our web design services offer benefits such as increased user engagement, higher conversion rates, responsive design for all devices, and a professional image for your business.
webdesign.how-it-works_description: We develop custom websites, from layout conception to final implementation. We work closely with you to understand your needs and deliver a site that meets your goals.
webdesign.testimonials_description: Our clients praise the quality and creativity of our designs. They highlight how our websites have helped boost their businesses and improve their online visibility.

infrastructure.why-use_description: We provide IT infrastructure solutions that ensure high availability, security, and scalability to support your business needs.
infrastructure.benefits_description: Our infrastructure services deliver benefits such as reduced downtime, enhanced data security, support for growing operations, and optimized IT costs.
infrastructure.how-it-works_description: We manage the entire IT infrastructure, from servers and networks to storage and virtualization. We implement tailored solutions to ensure your infrastructure is robust and efficient.
infrastructure.testimonials_description: Clients who have trusted our infrastructure solutions report greater reliability and performance in their operations. They highlight our ability to deliver solutions that meet their demands.

support.why-use_description: Our technical support provides quick and efficient responses to resolve issues and keep your operations running without interruptions.
support.benefits_description: With our technical support, your business gains benefits such as reduced downtime, fast problem resolution, access to experts, and increased team productivity.
support.how-it-works_description: We offer remote and on-site technical support, with a specialized team ready to address your needs. Our goal is to resolve issues quickly and effectively.
support.testimonials_description: Clients who use our technical support highlight the speed and quality of service. They value our ability to keep their operations stable and secure.

integration.why-use_description: We specialize in ERP system integration, connecting different platforms to ensure efficient workflows and consistent data across your organization.
integration.benefits_description: Our ERP integration services bring benefits such as improved operational efficiency, reduced manual errors, enhanced data visibility, and support for more agile business processes.
integration.how-it-works_description: We perform ERP system integration in a customized manner, analyzing your needs and connecting your tools to ensure seamless and secure data flow.
integration.testimonials_description: Clients who have integrated their ERP systems with us highlight improvements in efficiency and decision-making. They value our expertise in connecting systems effectively.
